Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you the chance to acquire a product that I believe will be incredibly valuable to your business. While I can't disclose the exact details of the product at this time, I can assure you that it's worth at least $1,000,000 to you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,050,000, a price that reflects its true value and provides a reasonable margin for both of us. I'm confident this will be a mutually beneficial arrangement. Let me know your thoughts. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,050,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,050,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
